item.title: America’s Foreign Policy Blob Smears Tulsi Gabbard For Critiquing Its Failed Overseas Interventionism
item.description: The D.C. establishment is smearing Gabbard as a Kremlin operative because she dares to criticize America's failed interventionist policies.

item.title: Americans Must Not Confuse ‘Healthier’ With ‘Healthy’
item.description: Foods depleted of all kinds of estrogenic additives might be better for us but that doesn't suddenly make boxes of sugar health foods.
